entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -37.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -37.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.9°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clear. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
